WRITING.TITLE: My deffkilla wartrike

WRITING.TEXT: Just chaos black spray paint
Thanks mate!

Used the gw agrellan earth, if that's what it's called, to get the cracked earth effect and also chucked down some patches of sand. Then I just primed it, worked up some sandy tones, doused it in the liquid talent that is agrax earthshade then went to town with some drybrushing!
Cheers! First try at a desert base, was pleased with outcome. Will use again.

WRITING.TITLE: My deffkilla wartrike

WRITING.TEXT: Thanks very much!

Dude
Worked from a base of khorne red and used highlights of brighter reds and oranges to work up to what it is now! Not exactly what I had in mind, but looks funky.
Thanks!
Thank you! Probably closer to about 16 or 17 I think, not counting the base. Mixed my paints for certain highlights and stuff!

WRITING.TITLE: Question about the new 40k app
WRITING.TEXT: I was wondering wether or not I should have access to the full rules on my 40k app by now? I have paid the subscription fee but just a little unsure as to when it will be available. Any help would be appreciated, cheers!
Thanks for your reply, that's helpful! I'm on Android.
Yeah, it's not great. I'll probs wait and see if the list builder is any good and if not just get rid. Thanks for your reply!

WRITING.TITLE: Swipe to see what highlighting can do!

WRITING.TEXT: The first highlight was Alaitoc blue and the second is lothern blue

A few people are asking which colours I used... Base of kantor blue, then a wash of nuln oil into the recesses and certain areas of the panels. First highlight is of Alaitoc blue and second highlight is lothern blue.

WRITING.TITLE: My Magnetised suppressors! (Satisfying click assured)

WRITING.TEXT: I placed the magnet at the very base of the back piece. I must say it was a bit of a messy job! Was the first time I had used magnets and wasn't executed very well. Initially I used magnets that were too small so didn't hold the whole model up. Then I kinda just had to clear away a lot of plastic to get the new magnets on. Its not very subtle but during a game/from the front its not noticeable!!
Cheers! Helps a lot for transporting them.
Yeah it's great, cheers!

Mucking around with an apple pencil
Mucking around with an apple pencil
Wee bit more of my redemptor done today. Slowly getting there!

WRITING.TEXT: Haha, thank you! I kind of didn't realise how comicbook it looked until it was assembled!

WRITING.TITLE: Just some fine details and base to go!

WRITING.TEXT: Guy on Facebook called scumbag kustoms does the crimson fist sheets. The roman numerals are just from the redemptor kit
Planning to write Dorn on his scroll actually! Too scared of the freehand though #128555;

WRITING.TITLE: Finished!

WRITING.TEXT: This is all done with a brush! Well, different brushes. Plasma is all drybrushed and the blue is just layered up.

Thanks! Its a base of kantor blue, some null oil in recesses, then a thick aliatoc blue highlight and a fine highlight of... i can't quite remember the name of it! Its turquoise in colour though (still a gw paint). Then a final sparse highlight of the turquoise colour mixed with white, just for the corners.
Thanks very much!
Cheers bud!
Rolled a 1

WRITING.TITLE: My Crimson fist redemptor!
Advice on carry/storage cases.
WRITING.TEXT: I'm looking to buy storage for my crimson fists army. I'm finding looking online a little daunting as there are so many options, a huge price range and don't really have many people that I can ask for opinions. Ideally, I'd quite like to have something that is versatile. I will soon (hopefully) have around 2000 points of space marines, heavily infantry based. There will be, however, a redemptor and some bikes, so units that won't fit in the standard "infantry sized" slots. I've seen quite a few company's sell foam trays which are cut to very specific sizes (you could have the whole of indomitus cut to size, for example) but I feel this might limit me to some extent. If anyone could give some suggestions as to what might fit my army that would be great!

WRITING.TITLE: My Crimson Fists force.
